title: Pbe discussion
body:
Anybody know how much time riot can respond about the pbe signup? I'd like so much the rework of urgot , or the new skin about tristana,veigar,twitch and fizz, i main all the adc,and i want try the new skin .
Sorry for my english is not pretty very well

replies.body: And don't be sure that you get a PBe account when you signup. I wait now for 3 years for a pbe acc

Those PBE Signups are still currently undergoing maintenance while we work on making the process much smoother. I still don't have an exact date on when they'll reopen, but you can be sure to know by checking our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news).
